content: कार्मुक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [कर्मणे प्रभवति उकञ् <ls>P. V. 1. 103.</ls>] Fit for or able to do a work, doing it well and completely. --कं {@--1@} A bow; तत्कार्मुकं कर्मसु यस्य शक्तिः <ls>Ki. 3. 48</ls>; त्वयि चाधिज्यकार्मुके <ls>Ś. 1. 6.</ls> {@--2@} A bamboo. {@--3@} The ninth sign of the zodiac. {@--4@} A kind of machine or instrument shaped like a bow.
